sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.snc.change_management" name="Change Management - Core" version="1.0.0" state="published" help="CSHelp:Change-Management-Core" provider_name="ServiceNow" invalidate_properties="true" licensable="false" trackable="true">
<description>Core change management plugin which both Change Management State Model and Standard Change Catalog plugins depend on.
This plugin will update the 'Type' field on Change Request to have the values 'normal', 'standard' and 'emergency'. The 'Type' value on existing Change Requests will be updated: Routine -> standard (Standard) Comprehensive -> normal (Normal) Emergency -> emergency (Emergency)
When creating a Change Request an interceptor will prompt you for the Type of Change you want to create. </description> <requires> <import plugin="com.snc.change_request"/> <import plugin="com.snc.change.collision"/> </requires>
</plugin> ]]></definition> <description>Core change management plugin which both Change Management State Model and Standard Change Catalog plugins depend on.
This plugin will update the 'Type' field on Change Request to have the values 'normal', 'standard' and 'emergency'. The 'Type' value on existing Change Requests will be updated: Routine -> standard (Standard) Comprehensive -> normal (Normal) Emergency -> emergency (Emergency)
When creating a Change Request an interceptor will prompt you for the Type of Change you want to create.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help>http://docs.servicenow.com/?context=CSHelp:Change-Management-Core</help> <id>com.snc.change_management</id> <licensable>false</licensable> <name>Change Management - Core</name> <path>plugin://com.snc.change_management/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.snc.change_request,com.snc.change.collision</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_created_on> <sys_id>com.snc.change_management</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-12-05 06:05:22</sys_updated_on> <trackable>true</trackable> <type/> <version>1.0.0</version> </v_plugin> </record_update>
